comment: Fermenting high to get some, fruity, spicy, and peppery flavors. Pitched at 80F, gradually cooled to 70F with water bath, trying to keep it around 70F for a few days, then creep up to 78-80F to finish, then dry-hop quickly and keg/bottle.
The extract makes the SRM fit perfectly with the style, somewhere around 8-10 SRM and a very golden color.
